prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies time with intricate clock-like features and a majestic appearance.
Imagine a powerful dragon-type Pokemon with a shimmering blue body and elegant metallic accents.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that controls time, featuring unique crystal structures on its back.
Design a Pokemon with a sleek, futuristic design, showcasing elements that represent both steel and dragon types.
Generate an image of a giant, winged Pokemon that exudes an aura of authority and wisdom.
Make a Pokemon that combines aspects of a dinosaur and a celestial being, with stunning blue hues.
Give me a legendary creature that stands tall and proud, symbolizing the power of time and space.
